verbs.description: The public [V: has] once again met a scandal within the Trump administration with a yawn . His approval numbers are even up some .
[ARG0: The public] has [ARGM-TMP: once again] [V: met] [ARG1: a scandal within the Trump administration] [ARGM-MNR: with a yawn] . His approval numbers are even up some .
The public has once again met a scandal within the Trump administration with a yawn . [ARG1: His approval numbers] [V: are] [ARG2: even up some] .
